sentences.sentence: Years probably would elapse before his return. Some of us might never see him again.
sentences.translation: 他这一去可能就是多年，席上有些人恐怕今世也难得再见他面。

sentences.sentence: The further off this solid obstruction, the longer time will elapse for the return of the echo.
sentences.translation: 固体障碍物越远，回声返回所用时间就越长。

sentences.sentence: The last seven years have all been ‘the year of the mobile’; it is not clear how many more such years will need to elapse!
sentences.translation: 过去七年被看作“手机年”，还不清楚将来还会持续多久。
